Portfolio

About

Anthony Robbers is a programmer with a grounding in Python, C++, and a few other minor languages as well as a solid introduction to java, HTML, and several more. He is interested in machine learning, database management, robotics, and engineering applications.

Anthony's Personal interest include space exploitation, SpaceX, exoskeletons, fictional worlds, crossover fanfiction, futurism, and strategy games.

Use Wufoo integrations and get your data to your favorite apps.

Around the Web

Copyright © Anthony Robbers 2016

Turtle Pentagon Fractal

This is a python turtle graphics project that draws a simple fractal image. This one is a pentagon layered 4 times with each layer half the side length of the previous layer and drawn at each corner.

  • Client: Udacity
  • Date: July 2016
  • Service: Python Programming

Turtle Octogon Fractal

Turtle Polygon Fractal

This is a python turtle graphics project that draws a simple fractal image. This one is a 9 sided regular polygon layered 3 times with each layer half the side length of the previous layer and drawn at each corner.

  • Service: Python Programming
